name: Format\TableCellSelector
description: The object for defining conditions that will cause a conditional style to be applied to a cell.

properties.name: columnIndex
properties.description: The number that specifies a column index. The leftmost column of data has an index of 0.

properties.name: descriptor
properties.description: A string that specifies the identifier of a specific data descriptor. All cells for this data descriptor will be selected. See DataDescriptor.

properties.name: evenColumns
properties.description: A Boolean value when true, selects the cells in even columns.

properties.name: evenRows
properties.description: A Boolean value when true, selects the cells in even rows.

properties.name: oddColumns
properties.description: A Boolean value when true, selects the cells in odd columns.

properties.name: oddRows
properties.description: A Boolean value when true, selects the cells in odd rows.

properties.name: rowIndex
properties.description: A number that specifies a row index. The topmost row of data has an index of 0.
